subject: Hockey, Ice
Fines (Penalties)
Playoff Games
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: Tarasenko scored two goals in the first period and then had an empty-netter, and the host St. Louis Blues defeated the Minnesota Wild to even their playoff series at a game apiece.
snippet: Tarasenko scored two goals in the first period and then had an empty-netter, and the host St. Louis Blues defeated the Minnesota Wild to even their playoff series at a game apiece.
